info.title: Open Api Specification for employee service
info.description: This API provides REST operations for interactions with the employee service.

servers.description: Example of server url is https://my1234567.crm.cloud.sap

parameters.name: $top
parameters.description: Show only the first n employees.

parameters.name: $search
parameters.description: Search for a string within employees.

parameters.name: $count
parameters.description: Indicates if count of employees to be returned.

two.summary: Creation of internal employee with Workplace Address and Employee Sales Responsibility

one.summary: Full Update of basic internal employee

parameters.name: If-Match
parameters.description: Used for conflict management when a consumer tries to update a resource. This parameter checks if the state of the resource known to the client (etag) matches the state on the server and if true, allows the update to continue.

412.description:
Precondition failed. 

The employee was changed in the meantime.

x-sap-extensible.description: You can create extension fields in the employee API by following the steps mentioned in https://help.sap.com/docs/CX_NG_SVC/2c87cece32844c91836e535aef8f9642/d3bdfac0c6b141c0bac27408c3ed159f.html?locale=en-US. The newly created extensions will be available in the API request and response body.
